summary:
Quality Assurance Consultant presso AKKA Technologies. Attività di QA supporting Supplier Quality Management e Life-Cycle product management relativamente all'area EMEA. 

Pregressa esperienza chimico-farmaceutica di laboratorio, in ambito di ricerca e GMP/QC.

currentPositions.description:
Supplier Quality Engineer EMEA Q&C Source for Kenvue 
- Annual audit plan management to API, excipient, cosmetic and food suppliers throughout Europe according to J&J guidelines
- Support in evaluating and finalizing audit documentation (including TrackWise process flow, change control deliverables completion) through direct interaction with internal and external (Supplier) stakeholders
- Management of the assigned Suppliers' Portfolio for qualification and monitoring processes
- Support on supplier quality issues management (micro failure, global investigation alerts)
- NPI/NPD supplier qualification process monitoring during products' tech transfer to the IM sites
- Support on Digital transformation processes
currentPositions.title: Quality Assurance Advanced Consultant

projects.description: Design and synthesis of new pre-catalysts that incorporate a N-heterocyclic carbene funticionality. Synthesis of new rhodium, ruthenium and copper complexes and their characterization (NMR, ESI-MS, IR). This research work is a collaboration with the group of Dr. Guy Lavigne and Dr. Vincent César at the CNRS in Toulouse.
projects.title: Sintesi di nuovi carbeni N-eterociclici

projects.description: Synthesis of 2-phenyltetrahydrofuran and 2,2-diphenyltetrahydrofutans, lithiation and direct functionalisation with a variety of electrophiles, in order to generate new carbon-carbon and carbon-heteroatom bonds. Synthesis of lactones as anticonvulsant agent.
projects.title: Lithiated Aryltetrahydrofuran and their use in organic synthesis

educations.schoolName: CNRS Toulouse, Laboratorie de Chimie de Coordination

educations.degree: Laurea Specialistica a ciclo unico in Chimica e tecnologia farmaceutiche

headline: QA Advanced Consultant, Akkodis

publications.description:
Abstract
Cycloreversion of α-lithiated phenyltetrahydrofuran was successfully tamed at −78 °C in a non-coordinating solvent in the presence of TMEDA. This anion showed excellent nucleophilicity and could be intercepted with a variety of structurally different electrophiles to give 2,2-disubstituted derivatives which can be further elaborated to γ-butyrolactones.
publications.name: "Gated access to a-lithiated phenyltetrahydrofuran: functionalization via direct lithiation of the parent oxygen heterocycle"

publications.description:
Abstract
An efficient functionalization of diaryltetrahydrofurans via a regioselective THF-directed ortho-lithiation is first described. This reaction could be successfully carried out in cyclopentyl methyl ether as a “greener” alternative to Et2O with better results in terms of yield and selectivity and, surprisingly, also in protic eutectic mixtures competitively with protonolysis.
publications.name: "Regioselective desymmetrization of diaryltetrahydrofurans via direct ortho-lithiation: an unexpected help from green chemistry"

publications.description:
Abstract
The mesoionic 5-acetylimidazolium-4-olate serves as precursor for an anionic, hybrid NHC, “IMes-acac”, consisting of fused diaminocarbene and acetylacetonato units, whose respective coordination abilities are evaluated by the formation of a series of representative copper(I) complexes illustrating the ambidentate character of the ligand.
publications.name: IMes-acac: hybrid combination of diaminocarbene and acetylacetonato sub-units into a new anionic ambidentate NHC ligand

publications.description:
ACS Omega, Vol. 3: , Issue. 11, : Pages. 15582-15591

Publication Date (Web): November 15, 2018
publications.name: co-author
publications.publisher: Homo- and Heteropolymetallic Complexes of the Hybrid, Ambidentate N-Heterocyclic Carbene Ligand IMes-acac

message.text: Elisa Pettineo sta #assumendo. Conosci qualcuno a cui potrebbe interessare?

📢 Hai già maturato precedente esperienza in ambito #qualitycontrol nel settore #pharma e nell'esecuzione di test ELISA quantitativo e qualitativo?

💊 La nostra divisione #lifesciences è alla ricerca di un QC Biochemical Analyst - Pharma. Candidati qui: https://lnkd.in/dBww3tsG

📍 Location: Pomezia

commentary.text: Sono costernata. Non ci sono più parole per queste atrocità, il resto del mondo non può restare a guardare.

Concordo. Non conta quanto ma come si legge. E il bello della lettura è che i libri ti aspettano sempre e ti rispettano se non hai voglia di aprirli. La lettura è un processo mentale e comportamentale oltre che un momento di svago...

Perché secondo alcune teorie, il lavoro in sede cementificherebbe il rapporto fra colleghi. Poi finite le 8 ore canoniche, li senti dire cose cattivissime su quegli stessi colleghi con cui 2 ore prima si prendevano il caffè. Quali sono i dati del burn out per i lavori in sede, confrontati con quelli dello smart working? Il burn out non è solo sovraccarico di lavoro ma anche (e direi soprattutto) un tollerare, giorno dopo giorno, comportamenti tossici e luoghi di lavoro che sembrano campi di battaglia. Indubbiamente c'è chi approfitta dei vantaggi dello smart-w, ma a lungo andare non si può barare... Ed in genere, chi non fa niente a casa, non ha mai fatto niente anche in ufficio.

Poi, questo discorso si annulla completamente per tutti quei lavori da svolgere obbligatoriamente in sede.
